**Bug Template:**
```markdown
Title: [Bug]: [Brief Description]
Labels: bug, [severity-label]

## Description
[What's wrong - from FB-XXX]

## Current Behavior
[What happens now]

## Expected Behavior
[What should happen]

## Steps to Reproduce
1. [Step 1]
2. [Step 2]
3. [Step 3]

## Impact
[How this affects users/system]

## Proposed Fix
[Solution approach]

## Related Feedback
FB-XXX: [title]
